about.title: About the library
about.subtitle: Narxoz University Library - center of knowledge and information resources

mission.title: Our mission
mission.paragraph1: The mission of Narxoz University Library is to support the educational process and research activities by providing access to quality information resources and creating a comfortable environment for learning and development.
mission.paragraph2: We strive to be a modern information center that helps students, teachers and researchers in acquiring knowledge, developing skills and conducting high-level research.

history.title: Library history
history.paragraph1: Narxoz University Library was founded in 1963 along with the university's establishment. Over more than half a century of history, the library has become one of the largest academic information centers in Kazakhstan.
history.paragraph2: Initially, the library collection contained only a few thousand books, but thanks to continuous development, it now includes more than 100,000 print publications and provides access to numerous electronic resources.
history.paragraph3: In 2018, the library moved to a new modern building equipped with the latest technology, which allowed expanding the range of services and creating even more comfortable conditions for users.

books.title: Over 100,000 books
books.description: Extensive collection of educational and scientific literature for all university specialties

electronic.title: Electronic resources
electronic.description: Access to electronic databases, including scientific journals and publications

spaces.description: Comfortable reading rooms and spaces for group work
